name: Space Escape (Alfian.)
description:
Description

Space Escape is heavily influenced by the classic game, Pipe Plumber. The aim of this game is to lead the rocket to the final destination by dragging the puzzle path on the upper right into the slot.

This game is still beta and still in development, so there might be bugs. Feel free to report the bugs and errors you found to alfiannathanufa@gmail.com thank you and happy playing!

Current Features

- 30 Levels

- Challenging Levels

- Easy to play hard to master
